MR No. 1399 - Wake Up, and Live for Christ; Forgive, and Love One Another; Work Unitedly

     (Written February 5, 1907, from Sanitarium, California, "To the Members of Our Churches in and About Melbourne [Australia].") 


     The Lord desires you to receive the gospel, and to practice it in your lives. He calls upon you to become humble seekers after Him, to receive the truth into good and honest hearts, and to reveal it in a decided change of character. Let every believer turn his attention toward seeking the Lord, that the church as a body may stand before God in true humility, the souls of the members cleansed from the defilement of sin.
